name: Kevin Jan Barluado
about: An experienced software engineer with over a decade of experience in both front-end and back-end development, who consistently meets tight deadlines and delivers superior performance. Proven ability to complete complex projects from scratch to design and implementation. Applies innovative planning and analytical skills to inform senior management of key trends, reduce company expenditures and time, and operate with a strong sense of urgency in a fast-paced setting. Able to diagnose and fix glitches to strengthen the security of the software and protect the database. Fluent in English, core competencies include AWS services, web development, web design, database design, software engineering, project management, team management, and research.

education.degree: Bachelor of Science in Information Technology

experiences.title: Software Engineer
responsibilities: Developed scalable web applications with Laravel, Vue.js, and Nuxt.js
Enhanced CI/CD pipelines using Docker, Linux, and AWS
Collaborated with teams using Agile practices for efficient project delivery

experiences.title: Full-Stack Developer
responsibilities: Created Web apps from scratch using React and AWS
Lead and delegate tasks to 4 team members
Supervise application assessment for quality and design accuracy

experiences.title: Senior Software Engineer
responsibilities: Maintained Website and improved security measures
Lead and supervised team of 4 ITs
Implemented weekly trainings to the development team

experiences.title: Senior Software Engineer
responsibilities: Maintained existing site and created email campaign program, 2FA

experiences.title: Software Engineer
responsibilities: Pioneered the development of a payroll system from scratch
